frontmatter.title: Python Mock and MagicMock
frontmatter.description: While Iâ€™m looking for a way to test my Python function that has a pymysql query, I stumble upon a code snippet with mock.MagicMock(). This pique my curiosity how it differs with mock.Mock() in Python. This article will discuss the difference between the two and when to use one over the other.
